p: The results of the sensory evaluation of the salmon burgers, control and samples treated with natural antioxidants did not show significant differences ( p < 0.05) for the parameters of color, odor, flavor and general acceptability ( Table 3). All samples were well-accepted, although no significant differences were observed between them. It can be also highlighted that the sample without antioxidants (control +) was the worst valued by the panelists, as shown in Table 3.
